name: Getting Things Done (GTD) Dashboard
description: Capture and organize your tasks for clarity.A Notion template that provides a reliable system for capturing tasks and projects, breaking them down into actionable steps, and regularly reviewing and prioritizing them. By doing so, you can focus on what needs to be done without feeling overwhelmed. This template is built upon the principles of the renowned Getting Things Done (GTD) method by David Allen. If you're hearing about it for the first time, you're encouraged to dive deeper into the GTD m
features: Clean and clutter-free layout.; Capture instantly using buttons.; Group your projects by life domains.; Batch complete your tasks by context.; Simpler pages optimized for mobile use.; Link relevant references to related projects.; Collect and categorize references by topic and type.; Archive and hide away inactive projects and outdated references.
